hey guys,

i was wondering if anyone could give me advice on how/what to input 
into my neural network (in progress). i'm a real newbie at this stuff 
so i still got alot to learn.

i have rabbits and wolves im trying to figure how i should feed them 
information. should i feed them a 2 array of thier local environment 
and if so, how does doing that differ feeding it 1d arrays? 

like i said, i'm a newb so any advice or referrals to other sites 
would be greatly appreciate. thanks

timmy
